name: Sabertooth
body:
### Big news: first stable release coming soon!

### What is Sabertooth?
Sabertooth is a lightweight and open-source chess engine written in C. It is fully UCI-compatible, for use with your favorite chess GUI. It currently plays at moderate-amateur strength, and improves every day!

### Is it compatible with my system?
Sabertooth works with Mac OS X or any 64-bit flavor of Unix/Linux. It doesn't presently support Windows, but this can be easily fixed (the only incompatible library is `POSIX threads`).

### How can I get Sabertooth?
Download it using the link on the left! Since Sabertooth is a UCI engine and doesn't include a GUI, you will need your own. I recommend XBoard, which has an excellent Mac port. 

### What's coming next?
Sabertooth doesn't currently support _en passant_, which is the next major release item.

### Authors and Contributors
Sabertooth is developed by Dylan D. Hunn (@dylhunn).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
